title: Foggy city street with multiple braking events
caption: The green ego vehicle is driving slowly on a foggy city street with multiple braking events.

reasoning: The green ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety in the foggy conditions. It slows down and brakes frequently to avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians.
